result.arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
result.translation: (4) The angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.[1955]
result.footnotes: [1955]- Bringing the exact measures apportioned for everything by Allāh in the course of the coming year.
